Mendokusai

Tartarus

The Long Road Home

17 Apr 2019

I’m about to begin the 6000km journey home, and I won’t get there for 30 or so hours. I’m probably not going to sleep in the interim, I certainly won’t find a bed, I’m a bit hungover and likely to be exceptionally tired for most of the trip. It’s definitely going to suck, but it was also without a doubt, 100%, categorically worth any kind of pain for the amazing two weeks that I’ve just had.
